name: mITREATT&CKThreatHunting
label: MITRE ATT&CK Threat Hunting
prerequisite: Ensure that SOC Simulator connector is configured
Ensure that MITRE ATT&CK Connector is configured
Ensure that MITRE ingestion is done
description: The solution pack demonstrates users a variety of scenarios and use cases around threat hunting based on using the information provided by the MITRE ATT&CK Framework.

playbooks.name: 04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Access Token Manipulation
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Boot or Logon Autostart Execution
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Credential Access
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Defense Evasion
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Event Triggered Execution
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Link Techniques to Alerts and Incidents
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Process Execution
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - Signed Binary Proxy Execution
04 - Use Case - MITRE ATT&CK™ - System Services
